# Introduction {.unnumbered}

This codebook is divided into four parts that follow the Methods section of the manuscript and includes eight code notebooks that were used in the analyses for this publication.

Source code is available in a GitHub [repository](%22https://github.com/trklab-metabarcoding/MolEco-MEC-1288%22)

Most input data files can be found in the `data/` directory; some larger data files can be downloaded from the Supplemental Materials \[placeholder link\].
